Package business

Class EncounterManager

java.lang.Object
business.EncounterManager
public class EncounterManager extends Object
This class is to manage all the logic regarding an encounterEncounter.

    • addMonsterToEncounter

      public Encounter addMonsterToEncounter(Encounter encounter, Monster monster, int amount)
      Method to add monster Monster instances into an encounter.
      Parameters:
      encounter - Encounter object containing the encounter the monsters Monster belong to.
      monster - monster Monster object to be added into the encounter Encounter.
      amount - integer value with the amount of monster Monster instances to be added.
      Returns:
      the encounter Encounter instance to which the monster Monster instance/s was added.

    • checkBosses

      public boolean checkBosses(Encounter encounter, @NotNull @NotNull Monster monster, int amount)
      Method to check if the monster Monster to be added into encounter Encounter makes the encounter to have more than 1 boss monsterMonster.
      Parameters:
      encounter - Encounter object containing the encounter the monsters Monster belong to.
      monster - monster Monster object to be added into the encounter Encounter.
      amount - integer value with the amount of monster Monster instances to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the encounter will have more than 1 boss monster Monster, false if not.

      Returns:
      a list of monster Monster instances.
